zeng2
Freq: 8178
zēng 字从曾从邑。“曾”义为“重复使用的”、“二手的”。“曾”与“邑”联合起来表示“重建的侯国”。
zēng is from Zeng Congyi. "Zeng" means "reused" and "second-hand". "Zeng" and "Yi" unite to mean "reconstructed Hou State".

鄫字的基本解释

鄫
zēng
中国周代诸侯国名，在今山东省枣庄市东。
中国春秋时郑的一个附庸国，在今河南省柘城县北。
姓。

鄫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zēng］
［《廣韻》疾陵切，平蒸，從。］
(1)古国名。在今山东省枣庄市兰陵。
(2)古地名。春秋郑地。在今河南省睢县东南。
(3)古州名。隋开皇为鄫州，大业废；唐武德四年复置，寻废。故城在今山东省枣庄市兰陵。

鄫字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄫； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1277第26
【唐韻】疾陵切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】慈陵切，?音繒。【說文】姒姓國，在東海。【春秋·僖十四年】使鄫子來朝。【註】鄫國，今琅邪鄫縣。　又鄭地。【春秋·襄元年】仲孫蔑會齊崔杼、曹人、邾人、杞人次于鄫。【註】鄫，鄭地。在?留襄邑縣東南。

考證：〔【春秋·僖四年】鄫子來朝。【註】鄫國，在琅邪鄫縣。〕　謹照原文四年改十四年。鄫字上增使字。註在字改今字。

鄫
Basic explanation of words
鄫
zēng
The names of the princes in the Zhou Dynasty of China are in the east of Zaozhuang City, Shandong Province.
A vassal state of Zheng during the Spring and Autumn Period of China was in the north of Zhecheng County, Henan Province.
name.
鄫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zēng］
["Guangyun" Chi Ling cut, flat steamed, from. ]
(1) Ancient country name. In today's Lanling, Zaozhuang City, Shandong Province.
(2) Ancient place names. Chunqiu Zhengdi. In today's southeast of Suixian County, Henan Province.
(3) The name of the ancient state. The Emperor Kaihuang of Sui Dynasty was named Pangzhou, and his great cause was abolished; Tang Wude was rebuilt in four years, seeking abolishment. The old city is now Lanling, Zaozhuang City, Shandong Province.
鄫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　鄫; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1277 26
[Tang Yun] Ji Ling cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Ci Ling cut,? Yin Zhu. [Said Wen] Si surnamed the country, in the East China Sea. [Spring and Autumn·Xi Fourteen Years] Bring Pangzi to Korea. [Note] Panguo, now Langxian Puan County.　Zhengdi again. [Spring and Autumn·Xiangyuan Year] Zhongsun Mia will be Qi Cuizhu, Cao Ren, Chu Ren, Qi Ren second to Juan. [Note] Juan, Zheng Di. In the southeast of Liuxiangyi County. Textual research: [[Spring and Autumn · Four Years of Xi] Piaozi came to Korea. [Note] The country of Piao is in Langxie Piao County. 〕 　 I would like to change the original four years to fourteen years. Add the word Shi to the word 鄫. Note that the word is changed to this word.
